title: VC shift up causes MC shift up

content.question: An increase in which of the following will cause a firm’s marginal cost curve to shift upward?

choices.label: The price of a variable input
The price of a fixed input
The demand for the firm’s product

content.answer: The price of a variable input

unit.text: 3: Production, Cost, and the Perfect Competition Model
